mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_contents (type, title, body, image_url, youtube_url, created_at, group_code) VALUES (#{type}, #{title}, #{body}, #{imageUrl}, #{youtubeUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{groupCode})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_quiz_results (user_id, quiz_id, is_correct, selected_answer, credit_earned, attempted_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{quizId}, #{isCorrect}, #{selectedAnswer}, #{creditEarned}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_correct = #{isCorrect}, selected_answer = #{selectedAnswer}, credit_earned = #{creditEarned}, attempted_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, quiz_id as quizId, is_correct as isCorrect, selected_answer as selectedAnswer, credit_earned as creditEarned, attempted_at as attemptedAt FROM user_quiz_results WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND quiz_id = #{quizId}
